title: After Ruling, Alabama Faces Hodgepodge Of Same-Sex Marriage Policies
teaser: Gay rights advocates have asked a federal court to order probate judges in Alabama to issue marriage licenses to same-sex couples.
contentencoded:
Gay rights advocates have asked a federal court to order probate judges in Alabama to issue marriage licenses to same-sex couples. Meanwhile, some couples staged a sit-in, of sorts, outside the Mobile County courthouse.

Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
